content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the cartoonist’s apparent skepticism of Bismarck’s diplomacy?

choices.label: Bismarck had established conventions for the division of Africa among the European imperial powers at the Berlin Conference.
Russia and Great Britain were engaged in a series of colonial rivalries in Central Asia known as the Great Game.
Britain had traditionally avoided diplomatic treaties that would commit it to military alliances with European powers.
German unification created a military and economic power that was capable of challenging Great Britain’s dominance.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
